title: Beyond Your Eyes
actors: Ra√∫l Buenfil, Jackie Di Crystal, Magi Avila, Victor Martinez
plot: A Mexican immigrant (Raul Buenfil)moves to USA for a better life for his family getting a deal that could not refuse, to live where he works, but his fate changes when he is haunted by evil spirits, the nightmarish journey starts to getting worst when he and an ex-worker try to find the reason of such of darkness to try to stop it but to find out that death is the ultimate price.
